headline: Why Analysts See Forge Global’s Story Shifting After Schwab’s $650 Million Cash Deal
summary: Forge Global Holdings has seen its fair value estimate trimmed from $50 to $45 per share as analysts reset their models around the cash acquisition offer, even as they acknowledge slightly stronger long term revenue growth assumptions and a marginally lower discount rate reflecting reduced perceived risk. This recalibration captures a market narrative that is shifting from pure growth optionality toward deal certainty and near term liquidity, while still recognizing the strategic validation...
